summary:
Creative Consultant with 20+years of experience in successfully orchestrating business development strategies for high fashion, premium  & luxury lifestyle brands, top tier international corporations and fine art institutions.

Plays an integral role within organizations by providing strategic direction across diverse fields of expertise including B2B, business development, brand management, key partnerships, marketing & communication.

Core predominance resides in implementing strategic sales & marketing campaigns targeting designated market areas including APAC, EMEA and the US; while operating a trusted network of key buyers & select e-tailers. 

Extended services include art advisory and the curating of fine art collections for both private and corporate entities.

Extended networks includes international press and media officers from fashion, fine-art, luxury lifestyle printed & digital formats, and tv broadcasters, publishing companies, full service production and creative talents agencies, event organisers, catering, security and various other blue chip service providers.

profile_positions.description:
ILÉ is a state of the art gallery showcasing a selection of truly astonishing fine art pieces by leading trans-disciplinary artists and master craftsmen originating from Benin, West Africa and its Diaspora worldwide.

We offer seasoned collectors and discerning art lovers the opportunity to explore new ways of collecting contemporary African fine art, advocating a lifestyle that is not just beautiful and luxurious, but deeply connected to history, culture, tradition, nature and community.  

Our curatorial focus on the technique, the authenticity and the high quality of the work is uncompromising.

We are committed to sustaining the visionaries who transcend ingenuity by applying their iterative eye to harmonising heritage with modernity.

Explore our selection of iconic fine art pieces and rare collectables, curated with the greatest care, not just to ignite your acquiring gaze but essentially bring more meaning, joy and wonder to your life. 

Welcome Home. Welcome to ILÉ !
profile_positions.title: FOUNDER

profile_positions.description:
Orchestrating impactful business development, marketing and communication campaigns covering designated market areas including APAC, EMEA and the US. 

Portfolio of luxury and premium brands includes fashion & accessories, high-end jewelry & watches, fine leather goods and haute parfumerie. Expertise further extends to Art advisory and consulting for the sell, the acquisition and the management of fine art collections for both private and corporate entities. 

- b2b, strategic partnerships
- pr, marketing, communication, events, sponsoring
- brand identity, brand image, digital toolkit 
- curation of art collections, quotations, transactions, account management, invoicing, logistics, general administration 
- management of artists, production management of made-to-mesure orders, special projects, creative collaborations
- staging of exhibitions, scenography, art fairs attendances

profile_positions.title: LUXURY BRAND CONSULTANT

profile_positions.description:
Managing international public relations for a portfolio of exclusive luxury and premium high fashion, jewelry & accessories, beauty & lifestyle brands. 

Press and media network includes leading institutional and specialized printed media formats, digital magazines, influential blogs, TV broadcasters and select media formats.

- runways, press days, product launches, store openings, creative collabs, sponsorings
- press & media planning, digital toolkits, online brand strategy, viral marketing 
- press shoppings, interviews, press travels, corporate networking, budget forecasting, reporting

profile_positions.title: LUXURY  SALES CONSULTANT

profile_positions.description:
Located in the Amsterdam's Spiegelkwartier, D&A Concept-Store presents a selection of internationally acclaimed designer labels, never before available in the Netherlands. By offering a truly unique luxury shopping experience, our concept store established itself as one of the favored destination for a clientele of both local style influencers and international fashionistas.

Exclusive Luxury Brands Portfolio:

Anna Sui
Atsuro Tayama
Bless
Barbara Bui
Callaghan by Nicolas Ghesquière
Christophe Lemaire
Eley Kishimoto
Martine Sitbon
Vivienne Westwood Gold Label
profile_positions.title: CONCEPT STORE OWNER

profile_positions.description:
Fashion coordination of RTW,  Small Leather Goods and Accessories collections plans for the group's portfolio of luxury brands in Hong Kong, Singapore, Taipei as well as Paris and Milan.

- collections plans coordination and qualitative monitoring of the supply chains 
- trends analysis & indicators and competitive intelligence
- provisional budget forecast, seasonal comparative analyzes and sectoral monitoring
- calculation of production costs, profit margins, implementation of the price strategy
- implementation of merchandising plans, collection insertions and training of sales forces
- compilation of monthly and annual reports
profile_positions.title: FASHION COORDINATOR

profile_positions.description:
In charge of promoting and selling the ready-to-wear collections, accessories and high perfumery products of Comme des Garçons Femme, Man Plus, Shirt, Tricot, Robe de Chambre, CDG CDG, Comme des Garçons Parfums.

- study and assimilation of the collections
- retail consulting 
- order placement, product management, logistics, pricing, inventories
- merchandising, layout plan, scenography
- sales analysis, reporting, general administration
